alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Cowley; Elk; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 11:03PM CDT until April 30 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Cowley County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Sumner County in south central Kansas... Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1103 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burden, or 11 miles east of Winfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Sedan, Howard, Cedar Vale, Burden, Moline, Longton, Dexter, Grenola, Atlanta, Geuda Springs, Elk Falls, Elgin, Cambridge, Maple City, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. This includes Interstate 35 near Mile Marker 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
